name: Field Renamer
introductoryText:
The first input specifies a data set consisting of two fields. Each record is a field rename operation. One field specifies the current field name, the second field specifies the new field name.

Example:

Current Name, New Name
–––––––––––––––––––––
Category, New Category
Isin, Isin Number 
Something else, Something renamed


The second input specifies the data set whose fields are to be renamed.
Example:

Index, Category, Name, Isin
–––––––––––––––––––––
1, Subordinated, ABBEY, XS0076061927 
2, Subordinated, HBOS, XS0070530885


After execution, the output would look like this:

Index, New Category, Name, Isin Number
––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––
1, Subordinated, ABBEY, XS0076061927 
2, Subordinated, HBOS, XS0070530885
